channel.title: Comments on: Ezra and his Flame-Throwing Crossbow

item.title: By: Mahmoud
item.dc:creator: Mahmoud
item.description: I'm actually one of Ezra's friends of course hes still in elementary now at next year im moving up to High School but while I was in elementary we had this gigantic science day project and I was in his group, to be honest he was in the genius group of his class, I first found out when my little sister who's in his class told me but I'm glad Blizzard made his dream come true.
item.content:encoded: I’m actually one of Ezra’s friends of course hes still in elementary now at next year im moving up to High School but while I was in elementary we had this gigantic science day project and I was in his group, to be honest he was in the genius group of his class, I first found out when my little sister who’s in his class told me but I’m glad Blizzard made his dream come true.

item.title: By: Kunikos
item.dc:creator: Kunikos
item.description: Why does Ephoenix use one fist weapon? *puzzled*
item.content:encoded: Why does Ephoenix use one fist weapon? *puzzled*

item.title: By: Grey Fox
item.dc:creator: Grey Fox
item.description: I am Ezra's Grandma, and I want to tell everyone at Blizzard that they made a horrible situation fade for a day. They made this the best day in Ezra's life. He now is facing extensive radiation and chemo and needs all the strength he can muster.
item.content:encoded: I am Ezra’s Grandma, and I want to tell everyone at Blizzard that they made a horrible situation fade for a day. They made this the best day in Ezra’s life. He now is facing extensive radiation and chemo and needs all the strength he can muster.

item.title: By: MajorMajor
item.dc:creator: MajorMajor
item.description: it's nice to know Blizz will take some time to do that.
item.content:encoded: it’s nice to know Blizz will take some time to do that.

item.title: By: Tyleulen
item.dc:creator: Tyleulen
item.content:encoded:
They decked him out in full epics and then put a spell crit gem on his chest?

L2P Blizz staff

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description:
That's freakin' awesome!
I need my sappy story quotient. :)
item.content:encoded:
That’s freakin’ awesome!
